description: Creates a missile repulsor at the origin of an entity.

params.name: entity
description: The entity that is to be a repulsor.

params.name: strength
description: The strength of the repulsor (maximum acceleration it can apply to a missle).

params.name: maxDist
description: The maximum distance at which the missile can be affected. The effect of the repulsor falls off from <strength> to zero from the center to this distance away from the center.
